payload.text:
I'm an senior mobile app developer, UI/UX designer and system architect.

I want to create a FULL FEATURED VOLUNTEER SERVICE APP.
This app will be used for social service and emergency help.

IMPORTANT RULES:
- All text, labels, buttons, messages MUST be in BANGLA
- App UI must be extremely beautiful, modern and professional
- Design should feel trustworthy, emotional and human-centered
- App must be mobile-first and smooth

APP TYPE:
- Mobile App (Android-first)
- Beginner friendly technology (suggest best option)
- Clean, scalable architecture

APP NAME:
- Suggest 3 Bangla app names related to volunteer service

CORE FEATURES (MUST INCLUDE ALL):

1. HOME SCREEN
- Organization name & logo
- Bangla mission statement
- Emergency Help button (‡¶ú‡¶∞‡ßÅ‡¶∞‡¶ø ‡¶∏‡¶æ‡¶π‡¶æ‡¶Ø‡ßç‡¶Ø)
- Quick access icons

2. VOLUNTEER REGISTRATION
- ‡¶®‡¶æ‡¶Æ
- ‡¶Æ‡ßã‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶á‡¶≤ ‡¶®‡¶æ‡¶Æ‡ßç‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶∞
- ‡¶†‡¶ø‡¶ï‡¶æ‡¶®‡¶æ
- ‡¶¨‡ßü‡¶∏
- ‡¶∞‡¶ï‡ßç‡¶§‡ßá‡¶∞ ‡¶ó‡ßç‡¶∞‡ßÅ‡¶™
- ‡¶¶‡¶ï‡ßç‡¶∑‡¶§‡¶æ ‡¶®‡¶ø‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶ö‡¶® (‡¶∞‡¶ï‡ßç‡¶§‡¶¶‡¶æ‡¶®, ‡¶§‡ßç‡¶∞‡¶æ‡¶£, ‡¶ö‡¶ø‡¶ï‡¶ø‡ßé‡¶∏‡¶æ, ‡¶â‡¶¶‡ßç‡¶ß‡¶æ‡¶∞, ‡¶Ö‡¶®‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶®‡ßç‡¶Ø)
- Register / ‡¶Ø‡ßã‡¶ó ‡¶¶‡¶ø‡¶® ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶ü‡¶®

3. LOGIN SYSTEM
- Phone number based login
- Simple & secure
- Bangla error/success messages

4. HELP REQUEST SYSTEM
- ‡¶∏‡¶Æ‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶∞ ‡¶ß‡¶∞‡¶®
- ‡¶∏‡¶Æ‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡¶∞ ‡¶¨‡¶ø‡¶¨‡¶∞‡¶£
- ‡¶≤‡ßã‡¶ï‡ßá‡¶∂‡¶®
- ‡¶Ø‡ßã‡¶ó‡¶æ‡¶Ø‡ßã‡¶ó ‡¶®‡¶æ‡¶Æ‡ßç‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶∞
- ‡¶ú‡¶∞‡ßÅ‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶§‡¶æ‡¶∞ ‡¶Æ‡¶æ‡¶§‡ßç‡¶∞‡¶æ
- ‡¶õ‡¶¨‡¶ø ‡¶Ü‡¶™‡¶≤‡ßã‡¶° (‡¶ê‡¶ö‡ßç‡¶õ‡¶ø‡¶ï)
- Submit Help Request

5. ACTIVE HELP LIST
- ‡¶∏‡¶ï‡¶≤ ‡¶ö‡¶≤‡¶Æ‡¶æ‡¶® ‡¶∏‡¶æ‡¶π‡¶æ‡¶Ø‡ßç‡¶Ø‡ßá‡¶∞ ‡¶§‡¶æ‡¶≤‡¶ø‡¶ï‡¶æ
- Card based beautiful layout
- Accept / ‡¶∏‡¶æ‡¶π‡¶æ‡¶Ø‡ßç‡¶Ø ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶ö‡¶æ‡¶á ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶ü‡¶®

6. LOCATION BASED SUPPORT
- Nearby volunteer detection
- Area wise help display
- Map integration (conceptual if needed)

7. BLOOD DONATION MODULE
- ‡¶∞‡¶ï‡ßç‡¶§‡ßá‡¶∞ ‡¶ó‡ßç‡¶∞‡ßÅ‡¶™ ‡¶Ö‡¶®‡ßÅ‡¶Ø‡¶æ‡ßü‡ßÄ donor list
- Last donation date
- Call / Message button

8. NOTIFICATION SYSTEM
- ‡¶®‡¶§‡ßÅ‡¶® ‡¶∏‡¶æ‡¶π‡¶æ‡¶Ø‡ßç‡¶Ø‡ßá‡¶∞ ‡¶Ö‡¶®‡ßÅ‡¶∞‡ßã‡¶ß
- ‡¶ú‡¶∞‡ßÅ‡¶∞‡¶ø ‡¶∏‡¶§‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶ï‡¶§‡¶æ
- Bangla push messages

9. USER PROFILE
- Volunteer profile
- Help history
- Availability status (‡¶â‡¶™‡¶≤‡¶¨‡ßç‡¶ß / ‡¶¨‡ßç‡¶Ø‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶§)

10. ADMIN PANEL (Conceptual)
- Volunteer management
- Help request moderation
- Reports & statistics

EXTRA FEATURES:
- Dark / Light mode
- Bangla + English font support (Bangla default)
- Smooth animation & micro-interaction
- Clean iconography
- Accessibility friendly

WHAT I NEED FROM YOU:
1. Complete app feature breakdown
2. Full screen-by-screen UI layout description
3. Suggested technology stack
4. Folder / project structure
5. Sample UI text in Bangla
6. Step-by-step development plan
7. Tips to make UI world-class
8. Future upgrade ideas (AI, analytics, etc.)

Generate everything clearly, professionally and beginner-friendly.
Do not skip any feature.

**Defining Project Scope**

I'm solidifying the project's parameters: a full-featured Volunteer Service App geared toward social service and emergency aid. The constraints are clearly defined: all content in Bangla, a trustworthy and aesthetically pleasing user interface, prioritizing a mobile-first design, and striving for a smooth user experience.


**Refining Project Specifications**

I've nailed down the app type as a React web app with a clean architecture and Android-first approach. We have the feature list including home, registration, login (phone), help requests, active help list, location-based support, blood donation, notifications, profile, and an admin panel. Extras include dark/light mode, Bangla font support, animations, and accessibility. Requested deliverables are detailed. After considering some Bangla names, I'm proposing "‡¶∏‡ßá‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶¨‡¶®‡ßç‡¶ß‡ßÅ" (Seba Bondhu - Service Friend), "‡¶∏‡¶π‡¶Æ‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶Æ‡¶ø‡¶§‡¶æ" (Shohomormita - Empathy), and "‡¶Ü‡¶≤‡ßã‡¶∞ ‡¶™‡¶•" (Alor Poth - Path of Light). The tech stack will be React, Tailwind CSS, and Lucide Icons.


**Detailing the Architecture**

I'm now diving deep into the technical architecture. I have a clear file structure in mind, including `metadata.json`, `index.html`, and `index.tsx`, along with the crucial components, services, and types. Also I've detailed the `constants.ts` file containing Bangla strings. The UI/UX is shaping up with a soft green/emerald base and red emergency accents. Rounded corners, soft shadows, and bottom navigation will provide a mobile-first user experience. I have wireframes drafted for the home screen and initial login/registration flows.

entries.description: App metadata and configuration including required permissions for location support.
Primary HTML entry point with Tailwind CSS and Google Fonts for Bangla support.
React entry point using React 18+ createRoot API.
Shared TypeScript interfaces and enums for the application.
Bangla text constants and layout definitions.

Home screen with mission statement, emergency button, and quick access.

entries.description: Feed of active help requests with card layout.
Module for blood donation with list and search.
User profile screen with settings and availability toggle.
Form for submitting a new help request.
Conceptual Admin Panel with stats and basic moderation view.
